title: Passenger vehicle sales surge 14% to 393,074 units in January: SIAM
description: Passenger vehicles and three-wheelers continued to achieve their highest sales ever for the period of April to January in FY 24. This growth was driven by positive consumer sentiments and strong sales in rural areas.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
